feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format the plan type label by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15855
  • Budibase AI in self-host. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15817

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.0...3.8.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix size of boilerplate screen components on mobile by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15856
  • Create new global DB for self-host quota. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15857
  • Allow numeric static formulas to be used in view calculations by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15852
  • PDF table component by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15838
  • Single row provider component by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15844
  • PDF screen template by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15788
  • Don't fall back on the PostHog decide endpoint. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15868

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.1...3.8.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for Automation bindings in Row actions by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15863

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.2...3.8.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add license feature for PDF and update UI to account for it by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15865
  • Fix popover root selector by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15881

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.3...3.8.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.8.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove mysterious curly brace by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15882
  • /api/global/configs/public performance improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15869
  • Automations External Data Connector picker by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15888

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.8.4...3.8.5
